news.title: Moody's downgrades United States credit rating, citing growth in government debt
news.summary: Moody's had been a holdout in keeping U.S. sovereign debt at the highest credit rating possible. The move brings the 116-year-old agency into line with its rivals.

news.title: Grok's 'white genocide' auto responses show AI chatbots can be tampered with 'at will'
news.summary: Elon Musk's Grok chatbot is showing yet again why generative AI has a trust problem with users. Grok is a chatbot created by Musk's company, Tesla.

news.title: Trump wants coal to power AI data centers. The tech industry may need to make peace with that for now
news.summary: President Donald Trump's push to revive the coal industry is running up against the tech sector's environmental goals. The tech sector is concerned about the impact of climate change.

news.title: Irenic snaps up a stake in Couchbase. Here are two tracks the firm can take to create value
news.summary: Activist Irenic has two paths to take at Couchbase to build value. "Irenic" is a founder and CEO of Couchbase, a social network for Couchbase users.

news.title: How much would a 100% 'Made in the USA' vehicle cost? It's complicated
news.summary: President Donald Trump wants automakers to build more vehicles in the U.S. with American parts. It's not as easy as it might seem.

news.title: ‘We’re not wealthy’: My niece is marrying out of state and she has a honeymoon fund. Is that cheeky?
news.summary: “We are making plans to attend just to show support. The invitation states that our presence is a gift in itself,” he said.

news.title: Trump recession is off the table — but trouble not over for U.S. economy
news.summary: President Trump’s move to defuse an ugly trade war with China not only sparked a massive stock-market rally, but also drove down the chances of recession — for now.

news.title: An increasingly popular healthcare savings strategy could get more lucrative under GOP tax bill
news.summary: The tax bill that advanced from the House Ways and Means Committee devotes a portion of provisions to broader rules on health-savings accounts.

news.title: My father’s widow keeps sending me $200 checks in the mail. Why would she do this?
news.summary: “I sent a ‘thank you’ card and asked what it was for, but I got no answer,” she said.

news.title: These 19 stocks at the intersection of AI and robotics could see big sales boosts
news.summary: As AI makes robots smarter, there will be many new ways to use them. Investors can find opportunities around the world to invest in robots.
